system.availability:
Gain +10 to Intelligence Tests related to the relevent Foe (including Scholastic Lore (Tactica Imperialis). Also, gain +1 Penetration when attacking the foe.
Kill Markers can't be acquired, only earned.
system.cost: Informal Kill Marker: Squad has Completed two or more Full Campaigns, or slain 150 of a particular foe. Such as Orks, Rebels, Dark Eldar, Chaos Worshippers, Kroot, Etc.
